CustomField.formula: Adult_Fare_Allocation__c + (IF( TEXT(Stopover_Inclusion__c) = "INC" , Stopover_Allocation__c , 0)) + (IF( TEXT(Transfer_Inclusion__c) = "INC" , Transfers_Allocation__c , 0)) + (IF( TEXT(Lounge_Inclusion__c) = "INC" , Lounge_Allocation__c , 0)) + (IF( TEXT(Insurance_Inclusion__c) = "INC" , Insurance_Allocation__c , 0)) + (IF( TEXT(Other_Inclusion__c) = "INC" , Other_Allocation__c , 0))
CustomField.label: Adult Total
